DOC.brief_summary: A natural form vitamin E call tocotrienol ( TCT ) , find many common food barley , decrease stroke size animal model . Vitamin E blood-thinning property lower cholesterol , make potential therapy stroke prevention , though effect less well characterized TCT . We plan conduct two trial ( I & IIA ) determine effect orally supplement TCT platelet function cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: NUTRITION : Natural Tocotrienol Against Ischemic Stroke Event
DOC.detailed_description: A natural form vitamin E call tocotrienol ( TCT ) , find many common food barley , decrease stroke size animal model . Vitamin E blood-thinning property lower cholesterol , make potential therapy stroke prevention , though effect less well characterized TCT . We plan conduct two trial ( I & IIA ) determine effect orally supplement TCT platelet function cholesterol . Phase I subject healthy volunteer , recruit advertisement . Phase IIA subject hyperlipidemic ( high cholesterol ) , refer u Wound Care Center Physicians . Patients randomized receive placebo pill , ( 400 800 mg ) TCT pill , low-dose 81 mg aspirin ( commonly use secondary prevention stroke ) , TCT aspirin together . Potential subject Phase-I meet study criterion agree participate study 6 month follow study related procedure , blood draw total 4 time , tape stripping ( non-invasive procedure ) , BMI , blood pressure measurement visit ( every month ) . Participants Phase-IIA blood drawn total 6 time , tape stripping , BMI blood pressure measurement participant study 13 month .
DOC.criteria: Phase IA Healthy subject 40 70 year age No history longterm vitamin E supplement ( defined daily oral tocopherol tocotrienol supplementation great equal 6mos ; within past 5 year ) No current vitamin E supplementation multivitamin Exclusion Criteria ( self report potential participant review eligibility criterion Research Nurse , ) Evidence heart disease diagnose physician one follow test ; EKG , chest xray , stress test , tilt table test , echocardiogram , coronary angiogram , electrophysiology test , CT heart scan , coronary MRI , pericardiocentesis High cholesterol ( total cholesterol > 240mg/dL , LDL > 160mg/dL ) Prior cancer diagnosis Pregnancy To exclude possibility pregnant woman enter study become pregnant study postmenopausal woman woman hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy include . Breast feed Smoker ( Must quit 5 year ago ) Alcohol dependence ( > 4 drink per day 1yr anytime last 3 year ) Medication exclusion criterion current use recent discontinuation ( within last 28 day ) medication include follow : anticoagulant bloodthinners ( e.g. , Warfarin ) , psychotropic medication include antipsychotic , moodstabilizers ( e.g. , lithium , valproic acid , carbamazepine/tegretol ) ; antidepressant ( tricyclic , SSRI 's , MAOI 's , nonselective MAOIs , Wellbutrin , St. John 's Wort ) ; antianxiety/antipanic agent ; antiobsessive agent ; prescription stimulant ( e.g. , Provigil , Ritalin ) ; diet pills/anorectics ; daily medication chronic pain ( e.g. , opiates ) muscle spasm ; daily use counter stimulant pill form ( e.g. , ephedrine ) ; daily medication asthma , Parkinson 's disease medication ( e.g. , levodopa , methyldopa , apomorphine ) , smoke cessation medication ( Wellbutrin/Zyban , Chantix/varenicline ) ; statin use ground exclusion . Phase IIA Hyperlipidemic patient 40 70 year age currently take statin LDL > 130mg/dL TG > 150mg/dL HDL < 40mg/dL No history longterm vitamin E supplement ( defined daily oral tocopherol tocotrienol supplementation great equal 6mos ; within past 5 year ) No current vitamin E supplementation multivitamin Evidence heart disease diagnose physician one follow test ; EKG , chest xray , stress test , tilt table test , echocardiogram , coronary angiogram , electrophysiology test , CT heart scan , coronary MRI , pericardiocentesis Prior cancer diagnosis Currently take blood thinner Pregnancy To exclude possibility pregnant woman enter study become pregnant study postmenopausal woman woman hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy include . Breast feed Smoking ( Must quit within past 6 month ) Alcohol dependence ( > 4 drink per day 1yr anytime last 3 year ) Medication exclusion criterion current use recent discontinuation ( within last 28 day ) medication include follow : anticoagulant bloodthinners ( e.g. , Warfarin ) , psychotropic medication include antipsychotic , moodstabilizers ( e.g. , lithium , valproic acid , carbamazepine/tegretol ) ; antidepressant ( tricyclic , SSRI 's , MAOI 's , nonselective MAOIs , Wellbutrin , St. John 's Wort ) ; antianxiety/antipanic agent ; antiobsessive agent ; prescription stimulant ( e.g. , Provigil , Ritalin ) ; diet pills/anorectics ; daily medication chronic pain ( e.g. , opiates ) muscle spasm ; daily use counter stimulant pill form ( e.g. , ephedrine ) ; daily medication asthma , Parkinson 's disease medication ( e.g. , levodopa , methyldopa , apomorphine ) , smoke cessation medication ( Wellbutrin/Zyban , Chantix/varenicline )
